bio: This Yo-kai will throw a fit whenever he doesn't get his way... It's probably time to grow out of that.

soultimate.name: Temper Tantrum
soultimate.inspiritEffects: Drop foe's movement speed by 70% and Move Meter speed by 50% for 30 seconds.
soultimate.description: Foes' speed is greatly decreased for a time.

skill.effect: Atk ↑ when attacked, 2% ↑ per hit, lasts till death.
skill.name: That All You Got?

name: Tantroni
